variable.comment: score of the game/ distance traveled
variable.name: F_Score

events.comment: Util that needs to perform every tick

action.name: Set text
action.param: "Debug mode" & newline & "fps: " & fps &" Time: "& floor(F_gametime) & " Score:" & F_Score & newline

sub-events.comment: set theSmartOne's motion base on player's position
remove enemies when out of layout

events.comment: Restart the game after Restart button is pressed
"initializing" variables when game is starting for restarting
